001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.initializers;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns.Strategy;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn.Neuron;
005
006import java.util.Random;
007
008/**
009 * Implements a random initializer. It sets every weight parameter of the model to a random value between [-1/#w, 1/#w]
010 * where #w is the number of weights.
011 * <p>
012 * The bias is left unchanged.
013 */
014@Strategy(role = Strategy.Role.CONCRETE)
015public class RandomNormalizedWeightInitializer implements NeuralNetworkInitializer {
016
017    private final Random random = new Random();
018
019    /**
020     * {@inheritDoc}
021     */
022    @Override
023    public void initialize(Neuron neuron) {
024        float[] weights = neuron.getWeights();
025        for (int i = 0; i < weights.length; i++) {
026            weights[i] = random() / weights.length;
027        }
028    }
029
030    private float random() {
031        return -1.0f + 2.0f * random.nextFloat();
032    }
033
034}
